Html: My Application window contains Two regions i.e. left & right and i have defined a keybinding in view of left region which contains button and combobox. And this is not working as expected when you press key on application starts beause of focusing issue as we are not focusing left region (Works well if you set focus on that region by selecting combobox).

Hi,

Take into account that when using key inputs you need to make sure that the control that has the input binding is focused in order for the binding to work.

For more information regarding this, I believe, you could find the following resources interesting:

  • Input Overview
  • Focus Overview
  • PRISM, WPF, Focus, Automatism
  • Setting initial control focus
  • KeyBindings in UserControl View

I hope you find this helpful,

Agustin Adami
